text: Bill Hudson (December 14, 1932 â€“ October 11, 2021) was an American Republican politician and businessman. He was born in Yuma, Arizona. He was a member of the Alaska House of Representatives from 1987 to 1995 and from 1997 to 2003.Alaska Legislature-Bill Hudson , Alaska Legislature.Alaska House of Representatives Bill Hudson Hudson died on October 11, 2021 in Castle Rock, Colorado at the age of 88. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Businesspeople from Arizona Category:Businesspeople from Alaska Category:Politicians from Arizona Category:Politicians from Alaska Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Juneau, Alaska
title: Bill Hudson (Alaska politician)
